#summary Installing Read Text Extension

= Install =

  * Get the most recent version of the extension at the [http://aoo-extensions.sourceforge.net/en/project/Read_Text Extensions web site]. 
  * Open the extension with the [http://www.libreoffice.org LibreOffice] or [http://www.openoffice.org OpenOffice.org] application. Approve the license. 
  * Restart the program.
